title: Explain impact of proportional sys. on party sys.

content.question: Identify a country in the AP Comparative Government course that uses proportional representation as a part of its electoral system. Explain how legislative seats are allocated in a proportional representation system. Describe the impact of proportional representation electoral rules on a party system.

frqParts.text: Identify a country in the AP Comparative Government course that uses proportional representation as a part of its electoral system. Explain how legislative seats are allocated in a proportional representation system. Describe the impact of proportional representation electoral rules on a party system.

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
